channel.title: CVE Feed for FANUC -- R-30iA, R-30iA Mate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FANUC -- R-30iA, R-30iA Mate

item.title: CVE-2021-32998|2024-09-17T00:35:47.210Z -- fanuc -- r-30ia%2C%20r-30ia%20mate
item.description: The FANUC R-30iA and R-30iB series controllers are vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code. INIT START/restore from backup required.
